name: Mitsurugi Great Purification
effectText: When your opponent activates a card or effect: Tribute 1 Level 5 or higher Reptile monster; negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Reptile monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, Tribute 1 other monster you control. You can only use 1 "Mitsurugi Great Purification" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
